ng-add.description: Adds Essential JS 2 specific Angular package to an application

heatmap-bubbletype.description: Creates an Angular heatmap component with bubble tile type.

heatmap-palettetype.description: Creates an Angular heatmap component with different palette type.

heatmap-renderingmode.description: Creates an Angular heatmap component with different rendering mode.

heatmap-sizeandcolorbubble.description: Creates an Angular heatmap component with size and color bubble type.
